RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 14, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE THIMBLE was off in the middle of the field, raced on the rail, saved ground through out, angled out into the five path in the upper stretch, was encouraged at the top of the lane, switched leads and had more, split horses at the eighth pole, then took the lead after the sixteenth pole and pulled away for the win. RISKTAKER vied for the lead and took the rail, was joined by two other foes who also wanted the lead, shortly after was joined by another on the outside, set the pace in a set of four, at the five sixteenth pole RISKTAKER took a breather, let the others go, shifted out into the four path in the upper stretch, came back and responded when asked to close, getting up for second. BRYKEN N MITCHELL was pinched at the start and was not able to recover and trailed through out. MIZSPELT vied for the lead, raced in between rivals as they set the pace, was under pressure the whole race and started to tire near the eighth pole. OSCAR CHOICE was off in the middle of the pack, raced four wide, maintained position while running an even race. ITELLYOUTHEFACTS vied for the lead, raced in the three path in between horses while setting the pace, stalked in the stretch, not enough today. CARLOS' BLAST was off mid pack, raced four wide but made no impact. PRICED RIGHT was keen on the bridle early, was asked to rate, pulled up to the leaders while racing in the four path, raced in a set on the lead, inched out in front, led into the stretch, then faded.

ENTRY.NAME: The Thimble
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, saved ground, shifted 5 wide, upper, led 1/16,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Spanish Cross Stable, LLC, P. DaleLadner & Allen Chiasson

ENTRY.NAME: Risktaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, inside, shuffled back, angled 4 wide, upper, clo

ENTRY.NAME: Bryken N Mitchell
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched start, trailed through out

ENTRY.NAME: Mizspelt
ENTRY.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Hanna James E
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, 2w, trained in a set, tired near the eighth pole

ENTRY.NAME: Oscar Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, maintained position, raced even

ENTRY.NAME: Itellyouthefacts
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied,3w,led,set, stalked stretch, did not have enough

ENTRY.NAME: Carlos' Blast
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, stalked, 4w, but made no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Priced Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, stalked, keen, outside 4w, led, 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 69. Claiming Purse 18000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 Mile and 70 Yards) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUE'S LITTLE ZING was off a step slow, was racing off of the early pace, advanced into mid pack while racing in the four path, launched a bid at the three eights pole, improved in the turn raced four wide in the stretch but made no impact. SHE TOLD YOU SO raced off of the pace, improved position, shifted into the four path, circled through the turn, gained ground and built momentum, closed in the stretch on the outside with force, cleared the leaders, hooked an inside foe in the last sixteenth, but never lost focus or drive and crossed the wire together, ending in a dead heat. SHEWASN'TEASY raced five wide and circled the field in the first turn, settled into a stalking position, stalked in the four path, maintained position through the second turn and faltered in the stretch. HOPEITSMYLUCKYDAY stalked the pace setters from the two path, raced in hands, bid at the five sixteenth pole, shifted out into the three path, split rivals, cleared the early leader, was ready and battled with the fast closing outside rival, battled until the wire and crossed together ending in a dead heat. CERTIFIED GEM vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the pace, then tired at the eighth pole. BROADWAY PEARL raced mid pack after the break, saved ground and raced on the rail, was in contention but ran flat in the stretch drive. DRIFTING MELODIES raced mid pack early in the four path, went wrong and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Sue's Little Zing
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, mid pack, shifted 4w, bid 3/8, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: dh-She Told You So
ENTRY.OWNER: Bockmon Danny and Joey Foster Racing and Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2w, shifted 4 wide, 3/8, circled outside, closed

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Danny F Bockman & Elm Tree Farm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Shewasn'teasy
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w, circled 1st, stalked, 4 wide, 2nd, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Hopeitsmyluckyday
ENTRY.OWNER: Hodges Phyllis J and Schneider Randolph
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2w, in hands, bid 5-16th, shifted 3w, btwn, clrd, battle

ENTRY.NAME: Certified Gem
ENTRY.OWNER: Tri-Star Racing LLC and Joey Foster Racing & Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, pace, tired, rail

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Pearl
ENTRY.OWNER: Roe Steve D and Roe Patricia L
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, saved ground, in contention, flat

ENTRY.NAME: Drifting Melodies
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, went wrong, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUCHO BUENO stalked the early pace, raced in the four path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, advanced on the outside through the turn, cleared the front runners and took command by the quarter pole, was lightly encouraged and drew off for an impressive win. SAINT DADDY stalked the pace from the four path, raced on the outside in the second tier, moved at the half, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, edged out at the quarter pole, hooked the rival running second, battled with that one until the wire, just got a nose in front at the wire, getting up for second. MECKES PRIORITY vied for the lead, raced in two path, sett he pace in a set, was cleared by an outside for at the quarter pole, shook the rival on the inside, hooked another closing rival battled with that rival down the lane while chasing the eventual winner, battled every step down to the wire but missed second by a nose, settled for third. WINE MY PRIORITY was off in the middle of the field, raced two wide, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, edged out into the four path leaving the turn, dropped over to the rail and raced in the stretch on the rail but finished flat. STAR READY trailed the field early, made a mild bid late. ALPHIN was off in the middle of the field, raced four wide, advanced and stalked from the five path and finished flat. KNIGHT OF HONOR vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the pace in a set with another rival, gave way at the quarter pole.

ENTRY.NAME: Knight of Honor
ENTRY.OWNER: Jones Catherine and Nelson Jr Eric D
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, pace, set, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Star Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, mild bid late

ENTRY.NAME: Meckes Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, 2w, set, shook inside one, hooked outside, battled,

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Bueno
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, bid 3/8, led 1/4, drew off, easily

ENTRY.NAME: Wine My Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 2w, bid 3/8,edged out 1/4, 4w, rail, flat

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, moved 1/2, bid 3/8, edged out 1/4, closed, 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Alphin
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, stalked, 5w, finished flat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 82. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since July 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 Mile and 70 Yards) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVERS NEVER SAY was off mid pack, improved and stalked from the two path, launched a bid at the five sixteenth pole, angled out into the three path, stalked a tiring early leader down the stretch, cleared before the final sixteenth pole and drew away for the win. C C'S COWGIRL raced off of the pace in the two path, waited patiently, stayed in touch with the field, bid at the three eighths pole, shifted into the four path and found her best stride at the quarter pole, closed clearing all her rivals except for the eventual winner running a game second. SHEZ OUR ARCH raced in the three path in between foes in the three path, improved after the half, bid at t he quarter pole, advanced into third and maintained the position getting up for third place.. GUEST IN MY HEART was off a bit slow, raced from well off of the pace, made one run and raced on the rail, saved ground, looked for the best route, launched a bid at the quarter pole when the rail opened up, and closed up the rail, running a nice race. GETONOUTTAHERE vied for the led, led in hands, raced in the two path ,launched a bid at the half mile pole, drew away from the field, then tired in the stretch. MY ALIBI raced in the middle of the field in the four path, maintained positioning, raced even. GLITTERARY was off a bit slow, raced off of the pace, and never got involved. HAVE I EVER flashed early speed, faltered. MYLIES STAR raced from off of the pace in the three path, and showed little. PREACH IT GIRL rated while racing on the rail from the middle of the field, then faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Preach It Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated, rail, mid pack, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Have I Ever
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed early speed, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Lovers Never Say
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 2w, stalked, 3w, bid 5-16th, stalked, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: My Alibi
ENTRY.OWNER: Salome Robert Joseph and Salome Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, maintained, raced even

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Cowgirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2w, in touch, 4w, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Shez Our Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: btwn, 3w, mid pack, mvd 1/2, advanced 1/4, maintained, 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Glitterary
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Guest in My Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, one run, saved ground, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Getonouttahere
ENTRY.OWNER: Rossi Lee J and Broyles Brandon
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, drew off 1/2, led, tired last 1/16th

ENTRY.NAME: Mylies Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w, showed little

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 25000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEDOWNTOFOOLAROUND emerged from the field after the break, went to the front, kept going and ended up a wire to wire winner. ANTIFREEZE raced from off of the pace, in the five path, made one run along the outside gaining ground and building momentum, raced in between rivals while advancing through the turn, closed down the stretch on the outside nicely, was no match for the winner but was second best. NATURAL TOUCH raced from mid pack in the six path, improved, stalked, was in contention but struggled to switch leads in the stretch and tired. HIGHLY GRAND stalked the leader in the four path, moved at the three eighths pole, led by the quarter pole, then tired. DULCE AMANECER YG raced from mid pack in between foes in the four path, shifted to the inside at the three sixteenth pole and closed well. SIERRA BLANCA lost an iron at the start, quickly recovered and raced in the three path, was bale to put in a mild bid late. CORA'S LEGACY raced from off of the pace, in the five path, was able to out finish the rest. STORM GHOST stalked the pace from the three path, maintained position, found her best stride late while closing up the rail for a nice finish. CINCO GAL vied for the lead, led from the inside, stalked the leader, then tired. GOOD BY FAITH vied for the led, matched strides and led with another rival. stalked the leader then tired. I'M GRINNIN staled from the rail early then steadily faded. MARY WHO never got involved.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Grinnin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rail, steadily faded

ENTRY.NAME: Cinco Gal
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, stalked, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Good by Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, stalked, 3w. tired

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Grand
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, moved 3/8, led 1/4, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Bedowntofoolaround
ENTRY.COMMENT: wire to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Ghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, best stride late, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Antifreeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, one run, 5w, between, closed out side, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Blanca
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost iron, 3w, mild bid late

ENTRY.NAME: Cora's Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace,5w put finished the rest

ENTRY.NAME: Dulce Amanecer Yg
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, between, 4w, shifted rail, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Mary Who
ENTRY.COMMENT: never got involved

ENTRY.NAME: Natural Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 6w, stalked, in contention, struggled to switch leads

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 7 1/2F Turf CR: 85. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be r un on the main track at one mile and seventy yards) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRIED PEPPER vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the pace for the first two calls, was cleared by an outside foe, steadied for a stride, too back, shifted out into the five path in the upper stretch, was asked and responded by comin back and closing on the outside getting up for the win. OKUDAH stalked the leader from the three path, challenged for the lead and took over before the turn, made the turn and led into the stretch, was caught late settling for second. MR. FOUR SEVENS was off in the middle of the pack, raced three wide ,circled the field through the turn, had no kick in the stretch. PHARME'S PHAITH raced from mid pack in the three path, launched a bid at the half mile pole, moved up quickly, then faded. TIO BLAS off slow, mild bid late. ANICLUDE was never involved. DUE APEAL had no impact. POST CLOSE forwardly placed early, faltered. LEMON KICK trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: Due Apeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: had no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Dried Pepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, steadied, took back, shifted out 1/8 closed, up

ENTRY.NAME: Post Close
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Aniclude
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Okudah
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, challenged, led, then caught late, 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Four Sevens
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, stalked, 3w, circled, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Kick
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed through out

ENTRY.NAME: Pharme's Phaith
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w, mid pack, bid 1/2, moved up quickly, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Tio Blas
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, mild bid late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DON'TCROSSTHEDEVIL raced in the middle of the pack, improved position, took lead by the half mile pole, and drew off for the win. DIAL IN FOR LUTE wan off a bit slow, raced off of the pace, made one run and closed, out finishing the rest. BILOXI was off in the middle of the field, was allowed to settle, made one run and steadily gained ground getting up for third. MUNQAD stalked the leader, improved and moved up putting a mild bid and faded. HEZA PICKLE off slow, off pace, best stride late. BLING'S BELLWETHER raced an even race. LAURI'S WISH flashed early speed. SPERLE was never involved. REQUISITION raced from mid pack and showed little. CANADIAN PRIDE vied, rail, stopped.

ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, improved, led 1/2, drew off
